about_the_game:
Train Valley 2 community is a gem! You are full of creativity and outstanding ideas that help us move forward with the game.

Our railway network is growing fast, and we are close to reaching 2000 community-made levels. We have picked some of the most played weekly and monthly featured levels, balanced and polished them, and created a series of packs called "Train Valley 2 GEMs". We are happy to present the second pack in the series – Train Valley 2: Emerald.

* Experience 50 new levels fully rebuilt and rebalanced
* Enjoy the smart combination of different mechanics and train ages
* Tons of tasks and brain-teasing missions
detailed_description:
Train Valley 2 community is a gem! You are full of creativity and outstanding ideas that help us move forward with the game.

Our railway network is growing fast, and we are close to reaching 2000 community-made levels. We have picked some of the most played weekly and monthly featured levels, balanced and polished them, and created a series of packs called "Train Valley 2 GEMs". We are happy to present the second pack in the series – Train Valley 2: Emerald.

* Experience 50 new levels fully rebuilt and rebalanced
* Enjoy the smart combination of different mechanics and train ages
* Tons of tasks and brain-teasing missions

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS+
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or SteamOS+
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.12+
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X El Capitan
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista SP1+
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATi Radeon HD 2400 or NVIDIA GeForce 7600
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX1050 Ti or higher
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Train Valley 2: Emerald includes 50 new levels with a smart combination of different mechanics and train ages. Try to beat all the brain-teasing missions.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Turkish, Czech, Swedish
